title: The Future of Finance — Virginia Law Weekly - Virginia Law Weekly
content: The Future of Finance — Virginia Law Weekly  Virginia Law Weekly
description: Nathan Wunderli ‘23 Sports Editor     My first foray into the world of finance began several months ago. I opened a brokerage account, put some dollars in it, and have since watched the market swing wildly, but overall trend downward, as my precious few dollars have tragically turned into even fewer
